alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:13AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, Lee, Scott and Wise Counties and the City of Norton through 215 AM EDT... At 113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Colson to near Maggard to Black Bottom to Callaway. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norton, Wise, Gate City, Jonesville, Big Stone Gap, Pennington Gap, Weber City, Coeburn, Appalachia and Pound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia.
